alert.note: Alert for Beckham; Custer; Roger Mills; Washita (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 4:30AM CDT until June 10 at 5:15AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Washita County in western Oklahoma... Southern Roger Mills County in western Oklahoma... Custer County in western Oklahoma... Northern Beckham County in western Oklahoma... * Until 515 AM CDT. * At 429 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles south of Cheyenne, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Elk City, Clinton, Cheyenne, Arapaho, Hammon, Canute, Butler, Foss, Sweetwater, Strong City, Foss Reservoir, Moorewood, Stafford, Berlin, and Dempsey. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail, damaging wind, and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
